document_data.name: Ba'etith
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ba'etith''' was an organization founded by the [[sarrukh]] in {{Yearlink|-34000}}.
document_data.Organization: The purpose of the Ba'etith was to study the primitive forms of [[magic]] utilized by the various races.{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-03-30 - Thayan snake sculptures}}
